ygData.subject: Re: Skills
ygData.msgSnippet: I recommend you save them for later. I saved almost all mine until 17 for feign death at the urging of a friend. I am so glad I did. FD takes very long to
ygData.messageBody:
I recommend you save them for later. I saved almost all mine until 17 for
feign death at the urging of a friend. I am so glad I did. FD takes very
long to raise, and starting out at 57 was awesome.

Praelor



> ---Original Message-----
> From: Blizzard [SMTP:blizzard15@...]
> Sent: Saturday, July 03, 1999 3:16 AM
> To: EQ_Monks@onelist.com; EQ-Monks@onelist.com
> Subject: [EQ-Monks] Skills
>
> I am a level 7 monk and i have 20 points to spend. Would you recommend i
> spend them on offensive skills now, save them for later, use them on a
> skill to make money, or use them on throwing. If on throwing is it a
> really good skill to get, does it do any damage or is it just to attract
> animals as ive heard. Thanks for your time.
>
> -Krazer, Level 7 Monk, Tunare
